name: Survival Prototype Game
description:
Hello everyone ( i work alone for my game ) and this the first prototype of my game  project  , evaluate please this stage of the project ; assets , animations, inventory(i) , crafting (G), the Ai, day night cycle, Ui, Weapon, Helmet for light( there two battery can pick them like the weapons, ammos, axe , hammer....you can toggle between 3thrd and first person with (V) //  for build mode press (c) for add building ressources because this prototype you can use arrows in the keyboard or with the hammer can destroy some rocks or bricks... and select between the different ressources ( red brick/White brick / rocks / wood ... by clicking the right mouse button ,for equip weapon  or use items open the inventory and right click for see the options...

Movement : Z,S,D,Q,E,A //  can move forward  with Z or W too.  Arrows for add resources... V for toggle between first and third person / L  for light after wear your helmet and you can equip helmet by inventory options and unquip  by F... C for building mode and C again for close your building mode...( you need close your building mode for back to normal stat..

i need your opinions freinds and thank you for your interaction.

Nb : Download the Updated Prototype ; the character can respawn after death.

Thank you.
